p: The 2014 WA-MCF outbreak at Kapiti Plains Ranch started on May 7th (week 19 of 2014) and ended July 31st in (week 31) affecting 215 animals (Fig. 1). The herd size at the beginning of the outbreak was 2467 animals. The incidence of WA-MCF in 2014 was 8.7 (95% C.I. 7.6–9.9) cases per hundred animals per year (Additional file 1). The estimated direct losses to Kapiti Plains Ranch were estimated ~ US$64,500.
